headline.print_headline: Creating a ‘Hamlet,’ of Sorts, in Eastern Slovakia
headline.seo: ‘Gypsy,’ by Martin Sulik, Fictional Portrait of the Roma
headline.main: Creating a ‘Hamlet,’ of Sorts, in Eastern Slovakia

docs.snippet: “Gypsy,” filmed with nonactors, doesn’t try to counteract stereotypes of the Roma people as shiftless, thieving hustlers. But it goes a long way toward explaining the antisocial behavior....
docs.abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Gypsy, directed by Martin Sulik.
docs.lead_paragraph: “Gypsy,” filmed with nonactors, doesn’t try to counteract stereotypes of the Roma people as shiftless, thieving hustlers. But it goes a long way toward explaining the antisocial behavior.

headline.print_headline: A Filmmaker’s Life, Part 2, or Maybe One and a Half
headline.seo: ‘Walk Away Renee’ Plays Both at BAM and on SundanceNow
headline.main: A Filmmaker’s Life, Part 2, or Maybe One and a Half

docs.snippet: Jonathan Caouette’s documentary “Walk Away Renee,” about a trip with his mentally ill mother, demonstrates a new age of film distribution....
docs.abstract: Jonathan Caouette documentary Walk Away Renee, about a trip with his mentally ill mother, is following the still lightly traveled digital path to distribution; film, which was originally shown at the 2011 Cannes Film Festival, will be available in June 2012 on independent film site SundanceNOW as a $6.99 rental.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jonathan Caouette’s documentary “Walk Away Renee,” about a trip with his mentally ill mother, demonstrates a new age of film distribution.

docs.lead_paragraph: The British violinist Charlie Siem performed Ysaÿe’s Sonata No. 2 and Vieuxtemps’s Concerto No. 5 at Le Poisson Rouge on Monday.

headline.print_headline: She’s Caught Between a Hapless Prince and a Virile Sorcerer

docs.snippet: In American Ballet Theater’s “Swan Lake,” Kevin McKenzie’s version casts two von Rothbarts, one in a seductive, human form and one who looks like Swamp Thing....
docs.abstract: Brian Seibert reviews ballet Swan Lake performed by the American Ballet Theater at the Metropolitan Opera House.
docs.lead_paragraph: In American Ballet Theater’s “Swan Lake,” Kevin McKenzie’s version casts two von Rothbarts, one in a seductive, human form and one who looks like Swamp Thing.

headline.print_headline: Love Lies in Carthage, But Duty Calls in Rome In Berlioz’s 5-Act Epic
headline.seo: ‘Les Troyens,’ at the Royal Opera House in London
headline.main: Love Lies in Carthage, but Duty Calls in Rome in Berlioz’s 5-Act Epic

docs.snippet: Berlioz’s “Troyens” has both inspired and confounded some of the best directors in the field, and David McVicar’s production uses updated imagery to tell the story....
docs.abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews David McVicar production of Berlioz opera Les Troyens, conducted by Antonio Pappano, at the Royal Opera, Covent Garden, in London.
docs.lead_paragraph: Berlioz’s “Troyens” has both inspired and confounded some of the best directors in the field, and David McVicar’s production uses updated imagery to tell the story.

headline.print_headline: Ousted Head Of University Is Reinstated In Virginia
headline.seo: Ousted Head of University Is Reinstated in Virginia
headline.main: Ousted Head of University Is Reinstated in Virginia

docs.snippet: Facing a torrent of criticism, the school’s trustees made a stunning turnabout Tuesday, voting to reinstate President Teresa A. Sullivan....
docs.abstract: University of Virginia trustees, facing a torrent of criticism, make a stunning turnabout by voting unanimously to reinstate president, Teresa A Sullivan, who they had forced to resign over concerns that the university was not adapting fast enough to financial and technological pressures.
docs.lead_paragraph: Facing a torrent of criticism, the school’s trustees made a stunning turnabout Tuesday, voting to reinstate President Teresa A. Sullivan.

docs.snippet: The chef Andy Ricker, owner of an acclaimed cluster of casual Thai eating and drinking places in Portland, Ore., expands his reach to a new restaurant, Pok Pok Ny....
docs.abstract: Pete Wells reviews Pok Pok NY restaurant in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn.
docs.lead_paragraph: The chef Andy Ricker, owner of an acclaimed cluster of casual Thai eating and drinking places in Portland, Ore., expands his reach to a new restaurant, Pok Pok Ny.

headline.print_headline: Roche to Shut Former U.S. Headquarters
headline.seo: Roche to Shut Down Former U.S. Headquarters, After 83 Years
headline.main: Roche to Shut Former U.S. Headquarters

docs.snippet: About 1,000 jobs will be lost when the drug giant closes its Nutley, N.J., site....
docs.abstract: Swiss pharmaceutical company Roche is shutting down its site in Nutley, NJ, which served as its American headquarters for 80 years; cost cutting effort will result in the loss of 1,000 area jobs.
docs.lead_paragraph: About 1,000 jobs will be lost when the drug giant closes its Nutley, N.J., site.

headline.print_headline: Iran’s Vice President Makes Anti-Semitic Speech at Forum
headline.seo: Iran’s Vice President Rahimi Makes Anti-Semitic Speech
headline.main: Iran’s Vice President Makes Anti-Semitic Speech at Forum

docs.snippet: The speech by Mohammad-Reza Rahimi, who blamed Judaism’s holiest book, the Talmud, for causing the global spread of illegal drugs, seemed bound to further isolate Iran just days before new sanctions....
docs.abstract: Vice Pres Mohammad-Reza Rahimi of Iran delivers an anti-Semitic speech at an international antidrug conference in Tehran, saying that the Talmud, a central text of Judaism, was responsible for the spread of illegal drugs around the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: The speech by Mohammad-Reza Rahimi, who blamed Judaism’s holiest book, the Talmud, for causing the global spread of illegal drugs, seemed bound to further isolate Iran just days before new sanctions.
